Instance.description: Situation Goal for collecting Simoleons from a situation.

Tunable.name: amount_to_collect
Tunable.description: The amount of Simoleons collected from all relevant activities for this goal to pass.

TunableList.name: test_events_to_collect
TunableList.description: A mapping of test event -> score achieved when successfully ran.

TunableEnum.name: key
TunableEnum.description: The event to listen to for goal completion.

TunableTuple.name: value
TunableTuple.description: A tuple of the Simoleon amount to increment and other checks to make on the event before it satisfies the goal.

Tunable.name: custom_simoleons
Tunable.description: If true we will get the simoleons earned from the test event instead of the simoleons tunable.

TunableVariant.name: interaction
TunableVariant.description: When enabled, there will be a test to verify that the interaction sending the associated test event is the same as the tuned interaction.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The interaction to require the event to come from in order for it to satisfy the goal.

Tunable.name: simoleons
Tunable.description: The Simoleon amount the interaction results when completed.
